name: Vaccination Reminder System
description: Automate vaccination reminders for patients of all ages. Track immunization schedules, send timely reminders for due vaccines, and maintain compliance with MOH vaccination requirements.

messages.flu_campaign_en:
ğŸ‚ *Flu Season Vaccination*

Hi {{patient_name}},

Flu season is approaching! Protect yourself and your family with the annual flu vaccine.

*Why get the flu shot?*
â€¢ Reduces risk of flu illness
â€¢ Prevents serious complications
â€¢ Protects vulnerable family members

*Especially recommended for:*
â€¢ Adults 50+
â€¢ Children under 5
â€¢ Pregnant women
â€¢ People with chronic conditions

*Ready to schedule?*
1ï¸âƒ£ Yes, book my flu shot
2ï¸âƒ£ Schedule for my family
3ï¸âƒ£ Not interested this year

Reply 1, 2, or 3.

ğŸ’‰ Flu vaccines available now at {{clinic_name}}!
